revised_title: Crystal Symmetry and Molecular Constitution of Organic Compounds
tldr: The authors investigate the relationship between the crystal symmetry of simpler organic compounds and their molecular constitution. They explore three main relations: isomorphism, morphotropy, and enantiomorphism. The study focuses on aliphatic hydrocarbons, and the results are presented in this paper, with further findings on halogen and nitro derivatives of methane to be discussed in a future communication.
